title: Mourning the Queen as an American in London (Podcast)
itunes:title: Mourning the Queen as an American in London (Podcast)
description:
Bloomberg Opinion Editor Therese Raphael shares her thoughts on the passing of Queen Elizabeth II. Bloomberg News Digital Currencies and VC Reporter Hannah Miller discusses her Businessweek story Adam Neumann’s Return to Real Estate Comes With a Crypto Angle. François Candelon, Global Director of the BCG Henderson Institute, talks about the the continued evolution of the metaverse. Bloomberg News West Coast Correspondent Ed Ludlow talks about King Charles III's address as well as Rivian joining forces with Mercedes. And we Drive to the Close with Amy Kong, Chief Investment Officer at Barrett Asset Management.
Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
